Class DocumentTransformer

java.lang.Object
  edu.buffalo.cse.ir.wikiindexer.wikipedia.DocumentTransformer
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.concurrent.Callable<IndexableDocument>
public class DocumentTransformer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.concurrent.Callable<IndexableDocument>

A Callable document transformer that converts the given WikipediaDocument object into an IndexableDocument object using the given Tokenizer
